body_html: Do you think it would be good for API symmetry to have the same extension for tf.contrib.ffmpeg.decode_video or is that excessive? I can't think of many video files with multiple streams but what do I know?
body_text: Do you think it would be good for API symmetry to have the same extension for tf.contrib.ffmpeg.decode_video or is that excessive? I can't think of many video files with multiple streams but what do I know?
body: Do you think it would be good for API symmetry to have the same extension for `tf.contrib.ffmpeg.decode_video` or is that excessive? I can't think of many video files with multiple streams but what do I know?
